sentences.en: a venue run for the benefit of the community.
sentences.cn: 专为社区服务的会堂。

sentences.en: Among those 18 and over, 510,000 benefit claimants were not unemployed.
sentences.cn: 18岁及以上人群当中，有51万救济金申领者并非是失业者。

sentences.en: At first I gave him the benefit of the doubt.
sentences.cn: 起初，我姑且相信了他。

sentences.en: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor.
sentences.cn: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

sentences.en: For maximum benefit, use your treatment every day.
sentences.cn: 为了达到最佳效果，你每天都要接受治疗。

sentences.en: He doesn't have to go through this elaborate display for my benefit!
sentences.cn: 他不必为了我作这么详细的展示！

sentences.en: I am organising a benefit gig in Bristol to raise these funds.
sentences.cn: 我要在布里斯托尔组织一场义演来募集这些资金。

sentences.en: I hope that the decision taken today will be to the benefit of the whole nation.
sentences.cn: 我希望今天所作的决定将惠及我们整个国家。

sentences.en: I never had the benefit of a university education.
sentences.cn: 我从未受过大学教育。

sentences.en: I'll &B{give} you &B{the benefit of the doubt} as to whether it was deliberate or not.
sentences.cn: 在未证实你是否蓄意为之以前，我不认为你应承担责任。

sentences.en: In 1986 more than three million were receiving unemployment benefit.
sentences.cn: 1986年，有300多万人领取失业救济金。

sentences.en: Shalford is entitled to the benefit of the doubt.
sentences.cn: 沙尔福德暂且获得了信任。

sentences.en: Steve didn't have the benefit of a formal college education.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫没能接受正规的大学教育。

sentences.en: Ted might benefit from hearing his own voice recorded and played back.
sentences.cn: 听自己声音的录音回放对特德可能会有帮助。

sentences.en: The new credit cards will be of great benefit to our customers.
sentences.cn: 新信用卡将大大方便我们的客户。

sentences.en: The success in the Middle East redounds to his benefit.
sentences.cn: 在中东的胜利给他带来了好处。

sentences.en: There is little doubt that skin does benefit from exfoliation.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，脱皮对皮肤有益。

sentences.en: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.cn: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

sentences.en: they lived together &B{without benefit of clergy}.
sentences.cn: 他们未经教会同意正式结婚就同居了。

sentences.en: They received a benefit in the form of a tax reduction.
sentences.cn: 他们获得了减税优惠。

sentences.en: This could now work to Albania's benefit.
sentences.cn: 这种情况目前对阿尔巴尼亚有利。

sentences.en: those people eligible to claim benefit
sentences.cn: 那些可以申请补助的人

sentences.en: You need people working for the benefit of the community.
sentences.cn: 你们需要为社区谋利益的人。

words.tran_cn: 有益的，有利的；可享利益的
良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
受益地；获利地；有使用权地
[金融] 受益人，受惠者；封臣

phrases.tran_cn: 附加利益；额外利益；附加利益（人身保险）
得益于；得利于；因…而得到好处
教会的批准（指在教堂举行结婚仪式）
假定其无过失或无罪（因无充分证据证明某人有罪）；裁判员对可疑情况无把握时不对有关运动员作不利判定
福利制度；职工福利制度
有资格得到救济金(或补助费、抚恤金、保险金)
在未证明某人是否有过失或某种情况是否属实以前假定某人无过失或某种情况属实；无罪推定（指在没有证据之前，先假定某人无罪或相信某人的清白）

trans.tran_cn: 好处，优势，福利费，保险金，慈善活动
trans.tran_en: an advantage, improvement, or help that you get from something
if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way
if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way
an advantage, improvement, or help that you get from something
if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way
